RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 47000. (UP TO $8,178 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUANARE chased along the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, edged away to the finish kept to task. ALWAYS DIALED dueled from the three path with COWBOY LUKE to the inside, took over sole command seven-sixteenths from home, swung three wide into upper stretch under a drive, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong out, then ran on to safely preserve the place honors. BADLANDS RULER coaxed from the start, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. CROWN THAT SAINT chased four then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the stretch. COWBOY LUKE coaxed from the gate, raced three then two wide getting clipped behind with six furlongs to run when tucking directly in front of RUDY RUDY RUDY, dueled with ALWAYS DIALED, yielded the pace battle with seven-sixteenths to go, and gave chase, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. TWENTYEIGHTTOTHREE seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked five wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and tired. RUDY RUDY RUDY chased just off the inside and clipped heels with the back of COWBOY LUKE when that foe tucked in front, bobbled and was taken in hand losing about two lengths of ground and position, came under coaxing tucked inside at the three-eighths, angled three to four wide for home and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Guanare
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 3w 3/8, 5w upper, up 1/8, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Rudy Rudy Rudy
ENTRY.OWNER: Scuderi Vincent S Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R and Cotrone Robert
ENTRY.COMMENT: clipped heels, bobbled 3/4, chased 2p, ins turn, 3-4w uppr, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Cowboy Luke
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, clipped beh 3/4p, chased 3-2w, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Always Dialed
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3p, up 7/16, 3w upper, collared 1/8, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Badlands Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6-7w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Twentyeighttothree
ENTRY.OWNER: Politano James and Fisher Chaz R
ENTRY.COMMENT: 7w backstretch, 5w turn, coaxed 3/8, 6-7w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Crown That Saint
ENTRY.OWNER: Noda Orlando Hablan Los Caballos LLC Signature Thoroughbreds and SEI Ragazzi Rac
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile OrO ver In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAMA'S GOLD established the front from the get go and showed the way in hand just off the inside comfortably in front, remained patiently handled as the field got busy in behind midway on the far turn, swung three wide into upper stretch and was set down straightened away, edged away to inside the eighth pole and held clear to the finish. STRAPPED coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside through the first turn and then three wide down the backstretch, tucked back to the two path through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. WARRIOR RICHARD broke out at the start taking over the lane of the slow breaking SOUTH STREET, chased just off the inside and then along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. ACHILLES HEEL just off the inside through the opening bend, chased three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the far turn coaxed along from the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch and weakened. GUT FEELING coaxed from the start, chased three wide through the first turn and then six paths off the inside down the backstretch, went three to four wide through the far turn coaxed along from midway, swung five wide at the head of the stretch and weakened. ARREBATO coaxed from the gate, raced three wide through the first turn and then five wide down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and tired. SOUTH STREET broke a beat slow and lost his lane to WARRIOR RICHARD, who broke outwards, chased along the inside through the first turn and then three to four wide thereafter and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Warrior Richard
ENTRY.OWNER: AB Racing LLC and Crown Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 5w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: South Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slw, chased 4-3w, 3-4w upper, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Mama's Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, 3w upper, set down str away, held clear

ENTRY.NAME: Strapped
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, ins 1st turn, chased 3w, 2p 3/8, 7w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Gut Feeling
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 3w 1st turn, 6w backstretch, 3-4w 3/8, 5w uppr, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Arrebato
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 3w 1st turn, chased 5-3w, 6-7w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Achilles Heel
ENTRY.OWNER: Nicholas Racing Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st turn, chased 3-4w, coaxed 2p 3/8, 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Waya S. - Grade3 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1 3/8M Turf CR: 102. Stakes Purse 200000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MCKULICK (GB) settled tracking the front just off the inside from just off the pace, remained patiently handled until placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied and bobbled slightly just outside the eighth pole, collared her stable and barn mate a sixteenth from home, then edged away to the finish to prevail. IDEA GENERATION (IRE) established the front and showed the way rated on the pace just off the inside briefly and then along the inside, remained on hold awaiting a challenge until roused taking the two path into upper stretch, shook away straightened away, dug in under threat to the outside, got collared a sixteenth out and ran on willingly for the place honors. SISTER OTOOLE tracked the pace along the inside, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, angled out three to four wide into upper stretch, kept on to the finish. PARNAC (FR) tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Idea Generation (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated on pace ins, roused 2w 1/4p, dug in, collared 1/16, willing

ENTRY.NAME: Parnac (FR)
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds and Dream With Me Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed along 5/16, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: McKulick (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed 5/16, set down 3w upper, up 1/16, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Otoole
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed 3/8, angled 3-4w upper, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Joe Hirsch Turf Classic S. - Grade1 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1 1/2M Outer turf CR: 108. Stakes Purse 500000. OUTER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WAR LIKE GODDESS tracked the pace from near the rear while saving ground unhurried as the leader drew off, remained on hold until placed to coaxing near the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, rallied to get first run at the once well clear leader, seized command near the sixteenth marker and edged clear to the finish to score. SOLDIER RISING (GB) coaxed from the gate, raced along the inside near the tail of the field through the first two turns before tipping two to three wide down the backstretch, tucked back inside into the far turn, went seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. SO HIGH (GB) pulled on the bit early on spurting away and the rider remained settled not wishing to engage in a tug of war allowing his charge to settle into a comfortable rhythm while spurting away to a long lead just off the inside, remained in hand and showed the way well clear through the second turn and down the backstretch widening a bit to the far turn, remained just off the inside through to the five-sixteenths before tucking briefly inside, swung three wide into upper stretch let out for the drive, dug in under a drive under growing threat and was collared a sixteenth out, kept on to preserve the show honors in a strong effort. REBEL'S ROMANCE (IRE) coaxed from the gate, tracked the pace just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and stayed on one paced through to the finish. STONE AGE (IRE) just off the inside in pursuit from mid pack, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was outkicked. GRAND SONATA tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing five-sixteenths from home, swung five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was outkicked. PIONEERING SPIRIT coaxed from the start, tracked the front along the inside leading the main flight far behind the lone leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. ASTRONAUT chased two to three wide early on and then three to four wide down the backstretch, tucked to the two path through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: So High (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled on bit, long lead 2p, 3w upper, collared 1/16, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: War Like Goddess
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed near 1/4, 5w upper, up 1/16, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Sonata
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, bid, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Rebel's Romance (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, tracked 2p, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Pioneering Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, tracked inside, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Soldier Rising (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC Dubb Michael Bailey Morris Wonder Stables and Caruso Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, ins early, 2-3w backstretch, 7w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Stone Age (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Westerberg Brant Peter M Magnier Mrs John Smith Derrick and Tabor Michael B
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p mid pack, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, bid, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Astronaut
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 2p 3/8, 5-6w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Frizette S. - Grade1 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 87. Stakes Purse 400000. FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUST F Y I seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four to five wide into upper stretch taking over command, edged clear under a drive to prevail. CENTRAL AVENUE got bumped at the start by PRINCESS INDY, who broke outwards, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn, swung four wide into upper stretch, angled in under a right handed crop to take to the inside a furlong out, then kicked on belatedly to get up for the place honors. LIFE TALK chased three wide until tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, offered up a bid spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, then ran on to the finish and was bested for the place honors in the final jumps. EMERY six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch in closest aim of the leader, tucked three wide through the turn getting placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. IRISH MAXIMA coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path into the turn and came under coaxing three furlongs from home, got headed for the front swinging three wide into upper stretch, then tired in the drive. PRINCESS INDY broke out at the start bumping CENTRAL AVENUE, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coaxed along from the three-eighths, faded through the latter portion of the turn and went five wide at the head of the stretch, then tired through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Maxima
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 5p, to 2p 1/2, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Life Talk
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, to ins 1/2, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Indy
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 5w backstretch, 2p turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Central Avenue
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, 6w backstretch, 3w turn, 4w uppr, to ins 1/8, belated

ENTRY.NAME: Just F Y I
ENTRY.COMMENT: 7w backstretch, 4w turn, coaxed near 1/4, up 4-5w uppr, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Emery
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6-7w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Belmont Turf Sprint S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 105. Stakes Purse 200000. OUTER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $200 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,000 to pass the entry box and an additional $1, 000 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $1,000 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided as follows: $110,000 to the owner of the winner, $40,000 to second, $24,000 to third, $12,000 to fourth, $8,000 to fifth and $6,000 divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weights Three year olds, 124.; Older 126 lbs. Non-winners of a Graded sweepstake in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of as weepstake other than state-bred in 2023 allowed 4 lbs.; of two races other than maiden, claiming, starter or state bred allowance in 2023 allowed 6 lbs. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right t
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TODAY'S FLAVOR got bumped askew at the start by PIRATE RICK due to pressure from YES AND YES recovering outwards from a bobble, came under coaxing and showed the way in hand three then two wide, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive under threat and held well to prevail. THIN WHITE DUKE five then four wide in pursuit, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, went seven wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive steadily and willingly whittling away at the leader while along for the place honors. WIT four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. ALOGON chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. DANCING BUCK bobbled at the break, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. PIRATE RICK got bumped at the start between foes and then was briefly leaning on EAMONN before being extracted to the outside, chased six then five wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung seven wide into upper stretch and weakened. ALEXIS S chased just off the inside down the backstretch, tucked inside half a mile from home, got steadied when bobbling placed in tight to the inside of EAMONN and WIT coming to the three-eighths marker, altered out two then three wide getting placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung seven to eight wide into upper stretch and made no impact. EAMONN got bumped at the start by YES AND YES and in turn bumped PIRATE RICK into TODAY'S FLAVOR, then got leaned on by PIRATE RICK before that rival was pulled off, chased three then two wide, came in slightly placing ALEXIS S in tight near the three-eighths pole, swung five wide into upper stretch and made no impact. YES AND YES bobbled at the start recovering outwards and bumping EAMONN commencing a chain of bumps out through TODAY'S FLAVOR, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, cornered four wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Alexis S
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, to ins 1/2, steady, bobbled 3/8, 7-8w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Alogon
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 4w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Yes and Yes
ENTRY.OWNER: Gleaves Philip A Straus Jr Joseph R and The Estate of Hugh A Fitzsimons Jr
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Eamonn
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, leaned on, chased 3-2w, 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Pirate Rick
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped btw st, chased 6-5w, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Today's Flavor
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, in hand 3-2w, set down 2w 1/4p, dug in, held well

ENTRY.NAME: Thin White Duke
ENTRY.OWNER: Gleaves Philip A Crist Steven deRegt Ken and Hilliard Bryan
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4w pursuit, coaxed near 1/4, 7w upper, dug in, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Wit
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable St Elias Stable and Gainesway Stable (Antony Beck)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Buck
ENTRY.OWNER: J and N Stables and Diamond M Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners O f A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROYAL POPPY coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, inched clear under a drive to prevail. WHITE CHOCOLATE coaxed from the start, showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside at that station under threat, dug in and was headed a furlong out, fought on latched on to the sixteenth marker before being shaken off late and was along clear of the rest and second best. SECURITY CODE coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and ran on to secure the show honors. I'MHAVINGAMOMENT got away to an awkward beginning, chased five then four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. OBRIGADA chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch, weakened. APROPOS coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, weakened. CUPIDS GIRL chased four then three wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, went six wide into upper stretch, made no impact. TRIPLE P coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing midway on the turn, swung three wide into upper stretch and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Security Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 3-2w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 3w uppr, up 1/8, inched clr

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, trailed

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Apropos
ENTRY.OWNER: Burning Daylight Farms Inc and November Hill
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Obrigada
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Champagne S. - Grade1 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 101. Stakes Purse 500000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIMBERLAKE chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, floated six to seven wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, edged clear under a drive kept to task. GENERAL PARTNER established the front shortly after the start and showed the way in hand three then two wide under pressure from SWEET SODDY J through the opening half mile to the outside, shook off that rival into the turn, came under coaxing nearing the quarter pole, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared near the eighth pole, ran on well clear of the rest to be along second best. DANCING GROOM broke out a step at the start, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing half a mile from home, went nine to ten paths off the rail into upper stretch and improved position to secure the show honors while never threatening the top pair. GOLD SWEEP came in and bumped jostled FIERCENESS shortly after the start, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and weakened. AIR CAV chased along the inside getting placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened. EL GRANDE O chased three to four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went eight wide into upper stretch, weakened. FIERCENESS lunged at the break throwing the rider temporarily off balance, got bumped and jostled by GOLD SWEEP coming in when SWEET SODDY J tucked in front shortly after the start, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking four wide through the turn, came under brief urging near the quarter pole for a stride or two, went seven wide into upper stretch getting tapped to the left side with the crop, then was in hand while flashed the crop to the left side through to the finish and tired. SWEET SODDY J prompted the leader from the outside four then three wide before being shaken off into the turn, tucked to the two path in behind that rival placed to coaxing at the seven-sixteenths and faded, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, then folded in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Air Cav
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Groom
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out step st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 1/2, 9-10w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Timberlake
ENTRY.OWNER: Siena Farm LLC and WinStar Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, ins turn, coaxed 3/8, 6-7w upper, up 1/8, edged clear

ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 3-2w, coaxed near 1/4, 4-5w upper, collared, second best

ENTRY.NAME: El Grande O
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 8w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Fierceness
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunge st, chased 6-4w, 7w upper, flashed crop stretch, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Sweep
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Soddy J
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 4-3w, 2p turn, faded, 4-5w upper, folded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Jockey Club Derby Invitational S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1 1/4M Dirt CR: 106. Stakes Purse 500000. AN INVITATIONAL FOR THREE-YEAR-OLDS. ows: $275,000 to the owner of the winner, $100,000 to second, $60,000 to third, $30,000 to fourth, $20,000 to fifth and $15,000 divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weights: Colts and Geldings, 122 lbs. Fillies, 119 lbs. Trophies will be prese nted to the winning owner, trainer and jockey. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Quarter on the Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOST ARK broke in at the start and was corrected, raced three wide forwardly placed through the first turn, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took over command swinging three wide into upper stretch, edged away under a drive inside the eighth pole, dug in and held safe to the finish. CLASSIC CATCH got bumped between foes and was steadied at the start getting away last, chased along the inside through the first turn and then three to four wide down the backstretch, tucked to the two path through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, closed well latching on the aforementioned foe in the final jumps to the wire. FEARLESS SOLDIER showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch displaced from command, then weakened in the final furlong. DATAMAN got bumped at the start by CLASSIC CATCH due to pressure from ANGLOPHILE, chased two to three wide until tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no response. ANGLOPHILE shied in at the start bumping and forcing CLASSIC CATCH to steady, raced three wide through the first turn and then four to five wide down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the far turn, went four to five wide into upper stretch and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Fearless Soldier
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable St Elias Stable and Gainesway Stable (Antony Beck)
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, to ins 1/2, coaxed near 1/4, ins 1/4, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Dataman
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2-3w, coaxed ins 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Catch
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump btw, steady st, 3-4w backstretch, 4w upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Anglophile
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied in st, 3w 1st turn, 4-5w backstretch, 4-5w uppr, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Lost Ark
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, 3w 1st turn, chased 3-2w, up 3w uppr, clear, safe

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of NEW

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 10 7F Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRAT PACK coaxed from the gate, vied three then two wide with a pair of rivals, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, edged away under a drive kept to task. SKYLANDER chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, remained patiently handled through the bend until set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, ran on to chase the winner home securing the place honors in the final jumps. OCEAN'S RESERVE vied six then four wide outside a pair of foes, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. MAKER'S CANDY coaxed from the gate, chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. TWELTH MAN six paths off the inside in pursuit down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch and weakened. BAD TO THE BONES coaxed from the gate, chased three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch, offered no response. LAFITTE'S FLEET chased along the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. FULL MOON MADNESS hustled from the gate, vied four then three wide loosely between foes, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide for home and tired. LEDDY coaxed from the start, chased four to five wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch, made no impact. CICCIOBELLO coaxed from the gate, chased four to five wide under coaxing from midway on the turn, went eight to nine wide at the head of the stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Twelth Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, coaxed 3w 3/8, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Full Moon Madness
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, vied 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Lafitte's Fleet
ENTRY.OWNER: Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R Speranza Steven and GRC Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 4w 7/16, 5-6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Leddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-5w, coaxed 7/16, 7-8w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Skylander
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, inside turn, set down 2w 1/4p, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Maker's Candy
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Staudacher David Maxis Stable and Huber John
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Bad to the Bones
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3w, coaxed 7/16, 7-8w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Cicciobello
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 8-9w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Frat Pack
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, vied 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Ocean's Reserve
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 6p, 4w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 11 1M Dirt CR: 87. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANT KEEP ME DOWN coaxed from the gate, vied two to three wide with a trio to the outside, tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch shaking away, drew clear under a drive to prevail. BON ADIEU vied six then four wide outside a trio coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and ran on to chase the winner home clear of the rest and second best. ROMAN GODDESS coaxed from the gate, vied between foes four then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. RUSSIARUSSIARUSSIA chased just off the inside and then along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. GHOSTLY GIRL vied five then three wide between foes until shaken off when under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch in retreat and tired through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Keep Me Down
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, vied 2-3w, ins turn, 2w 1/4p, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Russiarussiarussia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Roman Goddess
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, vied 4-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostly Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Toscano Jr John T Calia Richard and Salisbury Timothy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 5-3w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bon Adieu
ENTRY.OWNER: Werner J Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 6-4w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, second best
